Guest users can't invite users. Please r: Gäste können keine User einladen. Zum Einladen bitte anmelden.
customServer_text:
You can use the custom server options to sign into other Matrix servers by specifying a different Home server URL.
This allows you to use Riot with an existing Matrix account on a different home server.

You can also set a custom identity server but you won't be able to invite users by email address, or be invited by email address yourself.
Failed to get protocol list from Home Se: Fehler beim Abrufen der Protokollliste von Home Server
The Home Server may be too old to suppor: Der Home Server kann zu alt sein, um Drittanbieter-Netzwerke zu unterstützen
